# init(textCell:)

**Initializer**

Returns an NSCell object initialized with the specified string and set to have the cell’s default menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(textCell string: String)
```

## Parameters

- **string**: The initial string to use for the cell.

## Return Value

An initialized `NSCell` object, or `nil` if the cell could not be initialized.

## Discussion

If no field editor (a shared [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSText] object) has been created for all `NSCell` objects, one is created.

This is one of four designated initializers you must implement when subclassing. See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell#Designated-Initializers] for the complete list.

## Initializing a Cell

- **init(imageCell:)**: Returns an `NSCell` object initialized with the specified image and set to have the cell’s default menu.
